name: Knight of the Life
description:
A knight is sent to the depths of the 'dungeon of peril' to find treasure! But it won't be easy. Monsters and challenges await this brave knight, as well as a supposed curse that hurts whomever tries to attack the dungeon's inhabitance...

Now that my semi-serious game description is over, HI! Welcome to my third game jam game that I didn't put that much effort or time into compared to the previous two. But I guess it's something, right? Right??
